name: UIOT
0:
”Alexa, turn on the switch”
”Alexa,turn off the switch”
”Alexa, set the light to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill provides voice control for users who use UIOT smart devices. There are four types of devices that support control: SWITCH, LIGHT, SMARTPLUG, THERMOSTAT. They all support the basic on/off function. The LIGHT type of device additionally supports the function of adjusting the brightness. The THERMOSTAT type of device additionally supports temperature adjustment and mode adjustment. This skill only supports the control of devices under the UIOT brand. If you want to get a good device control response, make sure that the device is already bundled with the UIOT's central control host and that the device is working well. When authorizing your account, please use the account and password to log in to the mobile app under the UIOT brand.
